description: This file defines the root layout component for a Remix web application, including navigation, theme toggling, session handling, and layout structure.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Provides links to external stylesheets and resources for the application layout.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Fetches initial data for the layout, including user session info and theme preference.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Main layout component that structures the page, including header, sidebar, theme toggle, and outlet for nested routes.

methods.name: ThemeToggle
methods.description: A React component for toggling between light and dark themes, updating cookie and document classes accordingly.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Default exported route component that renders child routes via <Outlet />.
